name: Ion Slime
description: The Ion Slime is a small oozing creature capable of contorting through tight spaces, with a translucent form and glimmering surfaces that hint at its electrical properties.
memorable: It can absorb lightning attacks, healing itself and empowering its own attacks while being vulnerable to cold damage.
goals: To engage in combat while utilizing its unique elemental properties to gain an advantage.
relations: It may be found alongside other elemental creatures or oozes that thrive in electrically charged environments.
environment: Typically encountered in locations with high electrical activity or near bodies of water.
strengths: Resilient to bludgeoning and thunder damage, and able to utilize lightning to heal itself.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage, which can disrupt its supercharged state.
attacks: Can perform multiattacks with pseudopods dealing bludgeoning and lightning damage, with a potent discharge attack when supercharged.
most_powerful_ability: Discharge, which unleashes a powerful chain lightning effect after collecting ambient electricity.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing perception without relying on sight.
skills: Has proficiency in perception, enhancing its ability to detect threats in its surroundings.
additional_information: Amorphous trait allows movement through tight spaces effortlessly.
Ooze Nature means it does not require sleep.
Spider Climb ability facilitates movement on difficult surfaces without checks.
Supercharged state increases its AC and grants an additional action.
Feedback damage if it fails to use Discharge while supercharged.
